trans-unit.source: . [elro]
trans-unit.target: . [elro]

trans-unit.source: . Now checks the correct permission after using the pkg_resources.get_distribution api for checking (never catch an ImportError). [jensens]
trans-unit.target: . Now checks the correct permission after using the pkg_resources.get_distribution api for checking (never catch an ImportError). [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Add a span with a “noMenuAction” class around disable menus, allowing them to be styled. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Add a span with a “noMenuAction” class around disable menus, allowing them to be styled. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Add ability to specify a short title for the collapsed sidebar by setting extras[‘shortTitle’], in the same way as stateTitle. [MatthewWilkes]
trans-unit.target: Add ability to specify a short title for the collapsed sidebar by setting extras[‘shortTitle’], in the same way as stateTitle. [MatthewWilkes]

trans-unit.source: Add an actionMenuSelected class to selected menu items so they can be styled (same class as used in Plone 2.5). Do not remove the <span> tag around the &bull; for selected items so it can be removed when proper CSS styling is used. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Add an actionMenuSelected class to selected menu items so they can be styled (same class as used in Plone 2.5). Do not remove the <span> tag around the &bull; for selected items so it can be removed when proper CSS styling is used. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Add csrf tokens to menu urls that need it.
trans-unit.target: csrfトークンを必要とするメニューURLに追加します。

trans-unit.source: Add default icon for top-level toolbar entries [alecm]
trans-unit.target: トップレベルのツールバーエントリにデフォルトのアイコンを追加 [alecm]

trans-unit.source: Add markup changes related to new Barceloneta theme. [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: 新テーマ「Barceloneta」に関連したマークアップの変更を追加しました。[血まみれ]

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3.8 [pbauer] (#25)
trans-unit.target: Python 3.8のサポートを追加 [pbauer](#25)

trans-unit.source: Add test coverage for factory expression context when a front-page object is used for a folder. Fix in plone.app.content. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: フロントページオブジェクトがフォルダに使用されている場合のファクトリー式コンテキストのテストカバレッジを追加しました。plone.app.contentで修正。[rossp]で修正しました。

trans-unit.source: Added optional compatibility with zope.browsermenu. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: zope.b browsermenu との互換性をオプションで追加した。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added support for the new add_view_expr property available on FTIs. This can be used to construct a URL for add views. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: FTIで利用可能な新しいadd_view_exprプロパティのサポートを追加しました。これは、ビューを追加するためのURLを構築するために使用することができます。[optilude]

trans-unit.source: Added the prefix “folder-” to the CSS id of the folder part of the view contentmenu. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8375. [realefab]
trans-unit.target: Added the prefix “folder-” to the CSS id of the folder part of the view contentmenu. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8375. [realefab]

trans-unit.source: Adding “deactivated” class to menus by default, so they won’t flicker on load. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10470. [limi]
trans-unit.target: Adding “deactivated” class to menus by default, so they won’t flicker on load. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10470. [limi]

trans-unit.source: Adjust factory menu to use the new getIconExprObject method. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 新しいgetIconExprObjectメソッドを使用するようにファクトリーメニューを調整しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Adjusted tests to reflect new behavior introduced by the last change. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 前回の変更で導入された新しい動作を反映させるためにテストを調整しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Allow custom modal attributes for more links [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: より多くのリンクのためのカスタムモーダル属性を許可する [do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Avoid a bogus getToolByName indirection via getSite(). [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: getSite()を介した偽のgetToolByNameインダイレクトを避ける。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Avoid a deprecation warning for calling the
trans-unit.target: を呼び出す際の deprecation の警告を避けるために

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: バグ修正。

trans-unit.source: Change test-setup to allow testing AT and DX. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: ATとDXのテストができるようにテスト設定を変更しました。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 変更履歴

trans-unit.source: Code cleanup. [gforcad]
trans-unit.target: コードのクリーンアップ。[gforcad]

trans-unit.source: Contributors please read the document Process for Plone core’s development
trans-unit.target: 貢献者は、Ploneコアの開発プロセスのドキュメントを読んでください。

trans-unit.source: Correct the content menu html: the icons in menus should have an empty alt-attribute since the alternative text if no image can be seen is the label of the menu item itself. Move the description to the title attribute so it still shows up as tooltip. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: コンテンツメニューのhtmlを修正:画像が見えない場合の代替テキストはメニュー項目自体のラベルなので、メニューのアイコンは空のalt属性を持つべきです。説明文をタイトル属性に移動して、ツールチップとして表示されるようにしました。[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Custom menus
trans-unit.target: カスタムメニュー

trans-unit.source: Custom menus are registered in
trans-unit.target: にカスタムメニューが登録されています。

trans-unit.source: Depend on
trans-unit.target: に依存する

trans-unit.source: Display menu reorganization. Selected view/item should be on top of section and headings should appear as headings. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: 表示メニューの再編成。選択したビュー/項目がセクションの上に表示され、見出しが見出しとして表示されるようにしました。[ALECM]

trans-unit.source: Do not show the add item menu anymore on normal content, but just on folderish and default pages. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6744. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Do not show the add item menu anymore on normal content, but just on folderish and default pages. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6744. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Do not show the display menu if it is disabled (i.e. there is an index_html item in the folder). The previous behavior was confusing for users: the description with the hint to remove the index_html object was never shown and users only got a unusable menu item. The new behavior makes the display menu consistent with other parts of the Plone UI. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: 表示メニューが無効になっている場合(つまりフォルダ内にindex_html項目がある場合)には表示しないようにしました。以前の動作はユーザーを混乱させていました。index_htmlオブジェクトを削除するためのヒントが記載された説明は表示されず、ユーザーは使用できないメニュー項目を表示するだけでした。新しい動作により、表示メニューが Plone UI の他の部分と一致するようになりました。wichert]

trans-unit.source: Documentation in README added. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: READMEにドキュメントを追加しました。[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Don’t break if there’s no portal_actionicons tool. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t break if there’s no portal_actionicons tool. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Don’t extract dynamic messages with i18ndude. [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: Don’t extract dynamic messages with i18ndude. [vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Don’t show the menu-item to add content to a folderish default_page if no content can be added to it. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Don’t show the menu-item to add content to a folderish default_page if no content can be added to it. [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Escape the title of the defaultpage in the DisplayMenu. This fixes a potential xss attack and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8377. [csenger]
trans-unit.target: Escape the title of the defaultpage in the DisplayMenu. This fixes a potential xss attack and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8377. [csenger]

trans-unit.source: Fix “Manage Portlets” menus not appearing for “Site Administrators”. [@rpatterson]
trans-unit.target: Fix “Manage Portlets” menus not appearing for “Site Administrators”. [@rpatterson]

trans-unit.source: Fix Dexterity tests to use plone.app.contenttypes’ browser layer. Fix tests to work with new plone.app.contenttypes unified view names. [thet]
trans-unit.target: Fix Dexterity tests to use plone.app.contenttypes’ browser layer. Fix tests to work with new plone.app.contenttypes unified view names. [thet]

trans-unit.target: Fix non XML syntax compliant ids in contentmenus. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8195 [garbas,calvinhp]

trans-unit.target: Fix on factories menu, showing constrain options only when there are types to constrain. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8213. [igbun]

trans-unit.target: ポートレットのZCMLタイトル登録を修正。[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Fix review state icon position in toolbar when the user doesn’t have the permission to change the review state. This fixes https://github.com/plone/plonetheme.barceloneta/issues/110 [vincentfretin] (#29)
trans-unit.target: Fix review state icon position in toolbar when the user doesn’t have the permission to change the review state. This fixes https://github.com/plone/plonetheme.barceloneta/issues/110 [vincentfretin] (#29)

trans-unit.target: py3でportletmanager-menuitemsのソートを修正。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix the addContext in the FactoriesSubMenuItem to make it possible to add content to a folderish object that set as the default view on its parent folder. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10953. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Fix the addContext in the FactoriesSubMenuItem to make it possible to add content to a folderish object that set as the default view on its parent folder. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10953. [WouterVH]

trans-unit.target: 修正:パーミッションチェック

trans-unit.target: Fixed an issue with non ISelectableBrowserDefault aware content. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7226. [deo]

trans-unit.source: Fixed another translation problem in the factory menu when only one type was shown. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7023. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed another translation problem in the factory menu when only one type was shown. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7023. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed display menu to properly show content item titles with non-ascii chars. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6838. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed display menu to properly show content item titles with non-ascii chars. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6838. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed display menu to show the default page title correctly when the default-page is not a contained content item with DC metadata fields. Thanks to George Lee for finding this. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: デフォルトページがDCメタデータフィールドを持つコンテンツアイテムではない場合に、デフォルトページのタイトルを正しく表示するように修正しました。これを見つけてくれた George Lee に感謝します。optilude]

trans-unit.source: Fixed display menu to show the default page title when not currently viewing it as well as the display of markup contained in translations. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7281. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed display menu to show the default page title when not currently viewing it as well as the display of markup contained in translations. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7281. [witsch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed more translation problems with the display menu. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6838 again and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7115 as well. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed more translation problems with the display menu. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6838 again and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7115 as well. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Normalized typeIds on the factories menu, as these are used as CSS ids and would otherwise fail W3C validation for types with a space in the name. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6259. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Normalized typeIds on the factories menu, as these are used as CSS ids and would otherwise fail W3C validation for types with a space in the name. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6259. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Note that menu items are ordered by an ‘ordered’ property. To allow third party products to slot their own sub-menus in between the default menu items, these are registered with gaps.
trans-unit.target: Note that menu items are ordered by an ‘ordered’ property. To allow third party products to slot their own sub-menus in between the default menu items, these are registered with gaps.

trans-unit.source: Noted missing zope.publisher dependency and prefer absolute imports. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Query the types tool instead of the action tools to find add actions in FactoriesSubMenuItem. This fixes a discrepancy in action URLs. http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10207 [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Query the types tool instead of the action tools to find add actions in FactoriesSubMenuItem. This fixes a discrepancy in action URLs. http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10207 [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Removed loop that does nothing in plone.app.contentmenu.menu, in WorkflowMenu.getMenuItems(). [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: WorkflowMenu.getMenuItems()内のplone.app.contentmenu.menuで何もしないループを削除した。dreamcatcher]で

trans-unit.source: Removed no longer required zope.site dependency. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: zope.site依存関係を削除しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed the checking for hideChildren when a single item is present, this makes the styling consistent again. The menu is really a one-item menu, and we put it in the header as a shortcut that you can click directly. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9735 [limi]
trans-unit.target: Removed the checking for hideChildren when a single item is present, this makes the styling consistent again. The menu is really a one-item menu, and we put it in the header as a shortcut that you can click directly. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9735 [limi]

trans-unit.source: Rerelease due to double distribution ending up on PyPI. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: PyPIで二重配布が終了したため再リリース。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Restore the workflow menu on the folder contents page as it is the only way to change the state of the folder when it has a default page. Improves the fix to http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8908. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: Restore the workflow menu on the folder contents page as it is the only way to change the state of the folder when it has a default page. Improves the fix to http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8908. [rossp]

trans-unit.target: 独自の画面を定義するワークフローアクションに kssIgnore クラスを設定します。[ldr]

trans-unit.source: Show “add new” menu when there are one or more addable types. Showing a link when only one type was addable caused conflicts with the dropdown JavaScript. Closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10193. [esteele, davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Show “add new” menu when there are one or more addable types. Showing a link when only one type was addable caused conflicts with the dropdown JavaScript. Closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10193. [esteele, davisagli]
